ygData.subject: AW: Woohoo!  New effects for Singing Steel!
ygData.msgSnippet: dont you guys use forage? i do it frequently and have a never ending supply on food and water. food comes so pleny that i give it away to the poor clerics that
ygData.messageBody:
dont you guys use forage? i do it frequently and have a never ending supply
on food and water. food comes so pleny that i give it away to the poor
clerics that cry every time they have to relog because of a group bug or a
failed pull to clear hatelists ;) and all theis food is gone, hehe.

as for the boots, a friend gave me a pair as a present, but at lvl 40 i
still cannot use the effect. but its a very good enhancement on the boots
and greaves, will make them even more valuable.

tobi, lvl 40 smurf
<tod und teufel>
tholuxe paells


>SADDERZ for me, i'm gonna have to drag my sorry butt out of sebilis to run
to
>town to buy food and water now. (well mostly water)

Don't yaz know any helpful clerics/magicians?
Summoning Food and Water 1 at a time was so painful, especially since it
takes away from /gems time. ;-p

Kit
